education:
Yingying Jiang received the B.Sc. degree in School of Information and Safety Engineering from Zhongnan University of Economics and Law (ZUEL), China since 2017.
Currently, she is a Ph.D candidate at Embedded and Pervasive Computing (EPIC) Lab in School of Computer Science and Technology, HUST.
research_interest: healthcare big data, congnitive learning, etc.
hobbies: Playing badminton, Mountain Climbing, Watching Movies and so on
